item.title: DJ Roadblock's Friday Traffic Report: More Road, More Traffic, More Vex
item.description: DJ Roadblock brings you the Friday traffic chaos report ‚Äî Dem Boys nailed it: more road just means more traffic. Plus the Eccles roundabout is still a parking lot, and the East Bank corridor has drivers questioning their life choices.

item.title: üöó DJ Roadblock Traffic Report - Friday, January 30, 2026
item.description: DJ Roadblock with your Friday traffic update - Stanleytown bridge delays, Eccles roundabout chaos, and weekend getaway tips.

item.title: DJ Roadblock: Weekend Traffic Report & Road Vibes
item.description: DJ Roadblock brings you the Friday evening traffic situation and weekend road conditions across Guyana.

item.title: üöó DJ Roadblock Traffic Report: January 19, 2026
item.description: Yuh weekly guide to navigating de madness on Guyana roads. West Ruimveldt crying, Regent Street swimming, and de cones multiplying!

item.title: DJ Roadblock Traffic Report: January 16, 2026
item.description:
üéôÔ∏è WAAAAAH GWAAN GEORGETOWN! Is ya boy DJ Roadblock comin’ at you LIVE from de dashboard of me lil Raum, stuck behind a minibus dat ain’t move in 20 minutes!

üöó This Week’s Road Disasters

Sheriff Street Crater Update: Dat pothole by de KFC? She get BIGGER, family. Man tell me he see a Fielder go down in deh last Tuesday and ain’t come back out yet. If you driving Sheriff Street, say a prayer and hug de left side.

item.title: üîç [CRITICAL] Monday Brief: Crime Stats, Search & Rescue Upgrade, and Traffic Chaos
item.description: Murders up 11% despite overall crime drop, new $123M search and rescue system launched, over 3,100 traffic offences in one week, and financial system reforms promised.
